Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.io

package com.telenav.kivakit.core.io
  • Related Packages

    Description
    com.telenav.kivakit.core
     
  • Class
    Description
    ByteSizedOutputStream
    An output stream that keeps track of how many bytes have been written.
    IO
    Utility methods for buffering, closing, copying and flushing streams.
    IO.CopyStyle
    The style to copy in, either buffered or unbuffered
    LimitedInputStream
    An input stream that limits reading to a given number of bytes.
    LookAheadReader
    A simple stream that allows you to peek at what is coming next in an input stream, with LookAheadReader.lookAhead().
    Nio
    Convenience functions for working with FileSystems: Nio.filesystem(Listener, URI) Nio.filesystem(Listener, URI, Map) Nio.close(Listener, FileSystem)
    ProgressiveStringReader
    Reads string values from an InputStream (in a given encoding, if desired) or from a Reader.
    StringInputStream
    An input stream built around a StringBuilder to read it.
    StringInputStream.EncodingErrorBehavior
    How the stream should behave if characters in the string are not encodable in the target character set.
